Text:
Can you explain a littlebit more about installing this.
Only thing I find is "x703.apk" and a folder named "com.laminarresearch.xplane_default". In this folder a folder named files and in this folder a file named ".downloadConfig" and a zip file named "xplane_default_ati_9_70_0.zip".
So what is the "Data file" you are talking about.
works great. seeding now. you don't need the data folder. just use the apk and install. the game downloads data automatically.
